meanings.definition: A person who prefers to be nude.
meanings.sent1: The nudest at the beach always feels most comfortable without clothes.
meanings.sent2: The nudest in our group loves spending time in nature without any clothes on.
meanings.sent3: The nudest decided to have a 'naked party' where everyone had to come without clothes.
meanings.sent4: She was the nudest of them all, embracing her natural state without any inhibitions.
meanings.sent5: The nudest's passion for nudity was unmatched, always advocating for the freedom to be bare.

meanings.definition: The superlative form of 'nude', meaning the most nude.
meanings.sent1: In the painting, the artist captured the nudest of all the figures with intricate detail.
meanings.sent2: The model proudly posed as the nudest person in the room, showcasing their confidence.
meanings.sent3: The competition for who could stay the nudest the longest in the cold water was intense.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the sky turned the nudest shades of pink and orange, creating a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: The desert landscape appeared at its nudest under the bright moonlight, revealing its raw beauty.
